sentences.english: So the results showed that three plants of Spiraea L. had high drought resistance ability.
sentences.chinese: 由此综合比较可说明三种绣线菊抗旱性较强。

sentences.english: The flood control headquarters has urged local governments to step up efforts to fight the floods.
sentences.chinese: 防洪抗旱总指挥部办公室号召当地政府全力抗洪。

sentences.english: The result showed that the rate of photosynthesis was increased and drought resistance was improved.
sentences.chinese: 试验结果表明，光合强度和抗旱性都有所增加。

sentences.english: To combat drought and protect the seedlings is a matter of great urgency.
A lot of research is going into efforts to develop drought- resistant crops.
sentences.chinese: 很多研究都致力于培育抗旱作物。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a rape drought-resistance seed-soaking agent and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种油菜抗旱浸种剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The report cited data from the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 报道来援引了国家防汛抗旱总指挥部的数据加以说明。

sentences.english: The wheat (T. aestivum L. ) germplasm resources with drought resistance were grown in the field under rainfed and irrigated conditions respectively.
sentences.chinese: 在雨养和灌水条件下，田间栽培小麦抗旱材料。

sentences.english: Since then, it is urgent to transform the drought-tolerant gene.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于此，对西瓜转化抗旱基因使之节水势在必行。

sentences.english: The change extent of these indexes could reflect better the drought resistance of clones.
sentences.chinese: 各指标的变幅大小能更好地反映无性系抗旱性的强弱。

sentences.english: Also, methods of generating rain are being used by the government to fight against the drought.
sentences.chinese: 政府也正采取增雨的方法来抗旱。

sentences.english: While paying due attention to preventing floods, the country should prevent and fight drought as well.
sentences.chinese: 在注意防汛的同时，做好防旱抗旱工作。

sentences.english: While paying due attention to preventing floods, we should prevent and fight drought as well.
sentences.chinese: 在注意防汛的同时，做好防旱抗旱工作。

sentences.english: It was considered that the C. arborescens has higher drought resistance capabili…
sentences.chinese: 初步认为华北驼绒藜具有较强的抗旱能力。

sentences.english: In addition, field trials of drought- and salt-tolerant varieties of GM rice have taken place.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外还进行了耐盐抗旱品种的田地试验。

sentences.english: Drought resistance in maize is a synthesis character.
sentences.chinese: 玉米抗旱性是一个复杂的综合特性。

definition: to protect young plants, ensuring that enough survive to produce a good crop
drip irrigation/to irrigate by drip feed
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
